name: French Accents WordPress Plugin
author: hereladrastel

sections.description: French Accents adds the majuscule accents on the text editor. Some majuscule characters such as É, È, À, Ç, œ, or Ù cannot be typed on a french keyboard. The plugin adds for each character a button in the text editor to type them.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

I have a suggestion, a bug, or anything else

Write me an email at hereladrastel@gmail.com. I’ll answer as soon as possible.
